description: The DICOM format used in DIC files was developed by the NEMA (National Electrical Manufacturers Association) for exchanging and viewing medical images, such as CT scans, MRIs, and ultrasound images. DIC images more commonly use the .DCM extension.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .dic file in Microsoft Notepad 2004
images.caption: DIC file open in Microsoft Notepad 2004
